long_description: The women's DAKINE Sequoia gloves offer warm, waterproof and windproof coverage for cold temperatures. Stretchy removable liner gloves with touch-screen fingers keep you warm when you use your phone. Removable 4-way stretch liner gloves are touch-screen compatible so you can fiddle with your phone without exposing your bare hands to the cold. Nylon/polyester shells have GORE-TEX(R) waterproof breathable inserts to keep your hands dry on winter outings; exterior has a Durable Water Repellent treatment. High-loft synthetic insulation keeps your hands toasty; polyester tricot linings add warmth and wick moisture. Rugged RubberTec PVC palms offer good grip and durablity. Wrist closures seal in warmth; shockcorded guantlets cinch securely over your jacket sleeves. Soft panels on the thumbs of the DAKINE Sequoia gloves give you a gentle place to wipe your cold nose. Exterior pockets with water-resistant zippers are sized to hold small essentials or hand warmer packets (sold separately).
short_description: The women's DAKINE Sequoia gloves offer warm, waterproof and windproof coverage for cold temperatures. Stretchy removable liner gloves with touch-screen fingers keep you warm when you use your phone.
